Name: Perfect Blood & Sand
Ingredients: 15 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (discarded) & skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherries .
Review: I'm usually a maximum of five ingredients in a cocktail kind-a-guy, but this Blood & Sand riff with seven ingredients is balanced and tasty. If I were in Asia, where the number eight is lucky, then I'd have also used equal parts orange juice and blood orange juice to keep the number of ingredients lucky.
History: A riff on the classic Blood & Sand cocktail created in August 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Perfect Blood & Sand contains 204 calories
